self.name: messages.uploadMedia
self.description: Upload a file and associate it to a chat (without actually sending it to the chat)
self.descriptionExcerpt: Upload a file and associate it to a chat (without actually sending it to the chat)

arguments.name: peer
arguments.description: The chat, can be an inputPeerEmpty for bots

arguments.name: media
arguments.description: File uploaded in chunks as described in files Â»

throws.description: This method can only be run by a bot
throws.name: BOT_MISSING

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: You can't write in this chat
throws.name: CHAT_WRITE_FORBIDDEN

throws.description: The number of file parts is invalid
throws.name: FILE_PARTS_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The extension of the photo is invalid
throws.name: PHOTO_EXT_INVALID

throws.description: You're banned from sending messages in supergroups/channels
throws.name: USER_BANNED_IN_CHANNEL

throws.description: Failure while fetching the webpage with cURL
throws.name: WEBPAGE_CURL_FAILED
